---
title: '@socialproof/orderbook'
---

This package now exports a client extension that integrates with MySo clients.

```diff
- import { MySoClient, getFullnodeUrl } from '@socialproof/myso/client';
- import { OrderbookClient } from '@socialproof/orderbook';
+ import { MySoGrpcClient } from '@socialproof/myso/grpc'; // or MySoJsonRpcClient, MySoGraphQLClient
+ import { orderbook } from '@socialproof/orderbook';

- const mysoClient = new MySoClient({ url: getFullnodeUrl('mainnet') });
- const orderbookClient = new OrderbookClient({
-   client: mysoClient,
-   address: myAddress,
-   env: 'mainnet',
-   balanceManagers: { ... },
- });
+ const client = new MySoGrpcClient({
+   baseUrl: 'https://fullnode.mainnet.mysocial.network:443',
+   network: 'mainnet',
+ }).$extend(
+   orderbook({
+     address: myAddress,
+     // network is auto-detected from the client
+     balanceManagers: { ... },
+   }),
+ );

- await orderbookClient.checkManagerBalance(manager, asset);
+ await client.orderbook.checkManagerBalance(manager, asset);
```
